reviewText: My family is a Warren Miller fan.  These DVDs are great to watch after a day of skiing.  The kids even share them with their friends.  It even gives them some new "moves" on the ski hill.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is definitely NOT instructional -- it's purely inspirational.  Great ski house warming gift too.  For young and old it's just classic extreme ski set to great music but with a home movie feel and Warren Miller's great running monologue.  The perfect background movie to après ski get togethers.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I am a huge Warren Miller fan and all his DVD's are amazing...they are not educational, they will not teach you how to ski...
Title: N/A

reviewText: What can you say - Warren Miller is in a class by himself. Had most of his original VHS films. Enjoyed so much I went and got the DVD versions.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Warren Miller is a great icon in sports film and this set shows some of his best stuff.  It is fun to watch and appreciate his skill.
Title: N/A
